name: highway_type
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mymappi.
Tool description: REST Location APIs such as Geocoding, Roads, Directions and Places.
API description: Given a coordinate, finds the nearest road and determines what type of road it is (motorway, path, primary... etc.)

lat.description: The latitude of the geographic coordinate.

lon.description: The longitude of the geographic coordinate.

apikey.description: The API key for accessing the service.
